prompts: Create a legendary bird Pokemon with vibrant colors and majestic wings.
Design a mythical creature that embodies fire and rainbows in its feathers.
Imagine a large flying Pokemon with a fiery appearance soaring through the skies.
Generate a unique bird Pokemon that has both fire and flying types.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that has an impressive wingspan and colorful plumage.
Make a dynamic creature with a striking blend of red, yellow, and green colors.
Give me a majestic bird resembling a phoenix with bright, fiery feathers.
